content: new i m adding a printable pdf file of the note i personally use 3 notes to one page feel free to use written pattern coming soon i m working on my own website for it so keep an eye out for updates ************************************************ in this video i ll show you how to crochet one of my adorable worry pets using only basic stitches and techniques this pattern is completely beginner friendly feel free to pause and resume the video as much as needed and let me know what you think in the comments this is my first of many free patterns i wish to share so let me know what you think of the style editing music etc if you want to share you pet creations with me find me on instagram @bluefoxpaws i m on there frequently if you wish to make these pets to hide in public like i do please feel free to copy this text to print off for the pets if you found me it was meant to be i am a worry pet companion and friend when you need me i am stuffed with not only stuffing but off-cuts of previous crochet projects too that means i am full of inspiration determination patience and love give me a squeeze to release my magic and help ease your mind keep me in your pocket or bag so i m always there if you need reassurance or to help calm anxieties i ll always be here to help listen and love promise
